news.title: The Cleverlys Delay Signing
news.story: The Cleverlys signing will be delayed at the signing tent until 1 pm to allow for an extended Greensky Bluegrass signing. We apologize for the inconvenience.

news.title: Friday Weather Forecast
news.story: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High around 95F on the festival grounds. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

news.title: Festival Grounds Open Friday @ 10am
news.story: The second day of the festival commences an hour later with gates opening @ 10am. Barely enough time to get your tarp set up before the first flank steaks are ready to eat.

news.title: Punch Brothers Schedule Change
news.story: The Punch Brothers nightgrass set at the Sheridan Opera House on Sunday will be delayed 30 minutes until 11pm.

news.title: Telluride Troubadour Winner Announcement
news.story: Jeremy Witt wins the Telluride Troubadour contest. He will play a tweener set on Saturday afternoon at 3pm.
